title: Build Water Reminder App with offline functionality and comprehensive features

requirements.text: Implement Home screen with daily water intake display showing consumed amount in ml, percentage progress, remaining water amount, and an animated water level visualization inside a glass graphic that fills according to progress percentage

quotes: Show daily water intake (ml and percentage)
Animated water level inside a glass

acceptanceCriteria: Daily water intake displays current ml consumed and percentage of goal
Animated glass visualization fills proportionally to progress
Remaining water amount is clearly visible
All values update in real-time when water is added

requirements.text: Add large prominent 'Add Water' button and quick action buttons for preset drink sizes (e.g., 250ml, 500ml, 750ml) on the Home screen for rapid water logging

quotes: Quick action buttons for different drink sizes

acceptanceCriteria: Large Add Water button is prominently displayed
Multiple quick action buttons show common drink sizes
Clicking quick action buttons immediately logs that amount
Visual feedback confirms successful logging

requirements.text: Create smart reminders system with custom time picker supporting AM/PM format, configurable auto-reminders at intervals (1 hour, 2 hours, etc.), and wake-up/sleep schedule configuration

quotes: Auto reminders at intervals (every 1 hour, 2 hours, etc.)

acceptanceCriteria: Users can set custom reminder times with AM/PM picker
Auto-reminder intervals can be configured (1h, 2h, etc.)
Wake-up and sleep times can be set
Reminders respect the configured schedule

requirements.text: Implement night mode feature that automatically mutes reminders during configured sleep hours, with toggle controls for sound, vibration, and notification preferences
acceptanceCriteria: Reminders are muted during sleep hours when night mode is enabled
Individual toggles control sound, vibration, and notifications
Settings persist across sessions
Night mode status is clearly indicated in UI

requirements.text: Design and implement reminder popup UI displaying a list of all configured reminder times with enable/disable toggle for each individual reminder and a 'Reminder Settings' button linking to full settings

quotes: Beautiful popup with list of times

acceptanceCriteria: Popup displays all active reminders in a clean list
Each reminder has its own enable/disable toggle
Reminder Settings button navigates to detailed settings page
Popup design matches app's glassmorphism style

requirements.text: Create Drink Log screen showing daily water intake history as a timeline list of drinking events with timestamps and amounts
acceptanceCriteria: All water intake entries are displayed chronologically
Each entry shows timestamp and amount consumed
Timeline format is clear and easy to read
Today's entries are prominently grouped

requirements.text: Build Reports screen with daily, weekly, and monthly statistics including visual graphs, progress bars, and aggregated data showing water intake patterns
acceptanceCriteria: Reports display daily, weekly, and monthly views
Charts visualize intake trends over time
Progress bars show goal achievement rates
Statistics include averages and totals

requirements.text: Design Health Benefits screen displaying water consumption benefits including better digestion, improved concentration, strong immune system, better skin, and more energy, with icons and visual progress indicators for each benefit
acceptanceCriteria: Five health benefits are clearly listed with icons
Each benefit has descriptive text
Progress indicators show relationship to hydration level
Design uses card-based layout with proper spacing

requirements.text: Implement Settings screen allowing users to change daily water target, enable/disable reminders globally, select reminder sound, toggle between Light and Dark theme modes, and switch units between ml and oz
acceptanceCriteria: Daily water target is adjustable with validation
Global reminder toggle affects all reminders
Multiple reminder sounds are available for selection
Light/Dark theme toggle works throughout app
Unit conversion between ml and oz is accurate

requirements.text: Create side drawer navigation menu with links to Home, Drink Log, Reports, Reminders, and Settings screens with active route highlighting

quotes: Side drawer menu with: Home, Drink Log, Reports, Reminders, Settings

acceptanceCriteria: Drawer menu contains all five main navigation items
Active route is visually highlighted
Drawer can be opened and closed smoothly
Navigation works from any screen

requirements.text: Apply comprehensive design system with blue gradient theme (light blue #42A5F5 to dark blue #1565C0), supporting both Light and Dark modes, using soft gradients, glassmorphism effects, rounded corners (20dp), smooth shadows (6dp elevation), and modern card-based layouts throughout the application

quotes: Primary theme color: Blue gradient (light blue to dark blue)
Support both Light Mode and Dark Mode
Use soft gradients, glassmorphism, and modern card-based layouts
Rounded corners, smooth shadows, and minimal icons

acceptanceCriteria: All screens use blue gradient color scheme with specified hex values
Light and Dark modes are fully implemented and switchable
Glassmorphism effects applied to overlays and cards
All cards have 20dp rounded corners and 6dp shadows
Design is consistent across all screens

requirements.text: Implement smooth animations and transitions for all interactive elements including page transitions, button clicks, drawer opening/closing, and water level filling animation
acceptanceCriteria: All page transitions are smooth
Button interactions have hover and click animations
Drawer opens and closes with smooth animation
Water level animation is fluid and responsive
No janky or abrupt UI changes

requirements.text: Remove all external branding including any references to Caffeine AI name from the application interface

quotes: No external branding (remove Caffeine AI name)

acceptanceCriteria: No Caffeine AI branding appears anywhere in the UI
App uses only its own branding
All references to external tools are removed

requirements.text: Ensure application works completely offline without requiring any login or authentication system, storing all data locally
acceptanceCriteria: App functions without internet connection
No login or authentication screens exist
All data persists locally in browser storage
No network requests are required for core functionality

requirements.text: Apply clean typography with proper hierarchy and consistent spacing throughout the application following modern design principles
acceptanceCriteria: Typography hierarchy is clear and consistent
Spacing follows a consistent scale
Text is readable in both light and dark modes
Font sizes are appropriate for each element type

constraints: Do not implement any login or authentication system
Do not make any network requests for core app functionality
All data must be stored locally in browser storage
Use only the specified blue gradient colors: #42A5F5 (light blue) to #1565C0 (dark blue)
Remove all Caffeine AI branding from the interface
Ensure offline functionality works without Internet Identity
nonGoals: Integration with external health tracking services

required: Water droplet icon in blue gradient with glossy finish (water-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Animated water glass illustration showing empty to full states in blue gradient (water-glass.dim_256x256.png)
Health benefit icons set: digestion, brain, immune system, skin, and energy in minimal blue style (health-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)
App logo featuring stylized water wave in blue gradient (app-logo.dim_256x256.png)
